EnableViewmodelHands.title: Enable Viewmodel Hands
EnableViewmodelHands.tooltip: Adds a hand model to every item and tool when you hold them! Recommended: Enabled

EnableViewBob.title: Enable View Bobbing
EnableViewBob.tooltip: Makes the camera bob while you're moving.

ViewBobXAmount.title: Horizonal Intensity
ViewBobXAmount.tooltip: How much the camera bobs from side to side. Recommended: 1

ViewBobYAmount.title: Vertical Intensity
ViewBobYAmount.tooltip: How much the camera bobs up and down. Recommended: 1

ViewBobRollAmount.title: Roll Intensity
ViewBobRollAmount.tooltip: How much the camera should roll from side to side while moving. Recommended: 1

ViewBobPitchAmount.title: Pitch Intensity
ViewBobPitchAmount.tooltip: How much the camera should rotate up and down while moving. Recommended: 0

EnableToolBob.title: Enable Tool Bobbing
EnableToolBob.tooltip: Makes the item you're holding bob while you're moving.

ToolBobXAmount.title: Horizontal Intensity
ToolBobXAmount.tooltip: How much your held item bobs from side to side. Recommended: 1

ToolBobYAmount.title: Vertical Intensity
ToolBobYAmount.tooltip: How much your held item bobs up and down. Recommended: 1

ToolBobZAmount.title: Forward Intensity
ToolBobZAmount.tooltip: How much your held item bobs forward and backward. Recommended: 1

ToolBobRollAmount.title: Roll Intensity
ToolBobRollAmount.tooltip: How much your held item should roll from side to side while moving. Recommended: 1

ToolBobPitchAmount.title: Pitch Intensity
ToolBobPitchAmount.tooltip: How much your held item should rotate up and down while moving. Recommended: 1

EnableToolSway.title: Enable Tool Sway
EnableToolSway.tooltip: When enabled, your held item will lag behind the camera as you look around.

ToolSwayTranslateAmount.title: Translational Intensity
ToolSwayTranslateAmount.tooltip: How much the tool moves as you look around. Recommended: 1

ToolSwayRotateAmount.title: Rotational Intensity
ToolSwayRotateAmount.tooltip: How much the tool rotates as you look around. Recommended: 1

ToolSwaySmoothing.title: Smoothing Amount
ToolSwaySmoothing.tooltip: How smoothly the held item sways back to its normal position. Recommended: 1

DynamicToolPosBehavior.title: Dynamic Tool Position Behavior
DynamicToolPosBehavior.tooltip: When enabled, you will hold items in a different position depending on how far up/down you are looking. Recommended: Default

DynamicToolPosYAmount.title: Vertical Intensity
DynamicToolPosYAmount.tooltip: How much your held item moves up/down as the player looks up/down. Recommended: 1

DynamicToolPosZAmount.title: Forward Intensity
DynamicToolPosZAmount.tooltip: How much your held item moves forward/backward as the player looks up/down. Recommended: 1

UseJumpAnim.title: Use Jumping Animation
UseJumpAnim.tooltip: Makes the camera shake a bit when you jump, based on the view/tool bob amounts you set above. Recommended: Enabled

UseFallAnim.title: Use Falling Animation
UseFallAnim.tooltip: Makes the camera sway a bit as you fall, based on the view/tool bob amounts you set above. Recommended: Enabled

UseLandingAnim.title: Use Landing Animation
UseLandingAnim.tooltip: Makes the camera shake a bit when you land on the ground, based on the view/tool bob amounts you set above. Recommended: Enabled

UseScoutAnim.title: Use Scout Launcher Fire Animation
UseScoutAnim.tooltip: Makes the camera and scout launcher recoil when you launch a scout. Recommended: Enabled

HideStowedItems.title: Hide Stowed Items
HideStowedItems.tooltip: Makes the item you're holding move fully offscreen when it goes into the stowed position (i.e. if you start using another tool or roasting a marshmallow while holding an item). Recommended: Enabled

UseLeftyMode.title: Enable Lefty Mode
UseLeftyMode.tooltip: Makes you hold items/tools in your left hand!
